title: Elite void robe

properties.name: description
properties.value: The elite void robe is a piece of Void Knight equipment. It can be upgraded from a Void knight robe for 200 Void Knight commendation points by speaking to the Elite Void Knight, although a player must have completed the Hard Western Provinces Diary to be able to upgrade it. It is worn in combination with the other pieces of Void Knight armour to achieve the designated set effect, depending on which helm is worn. The stats are the same as the Void knight robe, but with a +3 prayer bonus, as well as a +2.5% damage boost to Ranged and Mage when worn with the Elite void top.

SMW Subobject for NormalHigh Alchemy value: 27300Examine: Superior leg armour from the order of the Void Knights.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Elite void robeUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Elite void robe.pngWeight: 8.164Value: 45500Version anchor: NormalRelease date: 5 March 2015Item ID: 13073

The elite void robe is a piece of Void Knight equipment. It can be upgraded from a Void knight robe for 200 Void Knight commendation points by speaking to the Elite Void Knight, although a player must have completed the Hard Western Provinces Diary to be able to upgrade it. It is worn in combination with the other pieces of Void Knight armour to achieve the designated set effect, depending on which helm is worn. The stats are the same as the Void knight robe, but with a +3 prayer bonus, as well as a +2.5% damage boost to Ranged and Mage when worn with the Elite void top.

If the player dies below level 20 Wilderness, it will remain in the player's inventory. However, the item will be unusable and must be repaired with 50,000 coins by using the item on Perdu.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
9 February 2017
(update | poll)

The item was recoloured to match other Void equipment.

18 June 2015
(update)

Fixed a stretching issue with void robes and dragonhide chaps whilst using Zul-andra teleport.

6 March 2015
(update)

The elite void robes were given a graphical update to reflect their appearance in RuneScape before their graphical update on March 2012.
